Disable flash encryption in Download boot mode
Enable SPI boot encrypt/decrypt. Odd number: enable; even number: disable
Select XTS_AES key length. 1: 256-bit of whole block3; 0: Lower 128-bit of block3
Set UART boot message output mode. 00: Force print; 01: Low-level print controlled by GPIO 8; 10: High-level print controlled by GPIO 8; 11: Print force disabled
Force ROM code to send an SPI flash resume command during SPI boot
Configure flash startup delay after SoC being powered up (the unit is ms/2). When the value is 15 delay will be 7.5 ms
Disables check of wafer version major
Disables check of blk version major
